title: Keybinds
body:
Can we have individual keybinds for champs eg: I like vayne and cait, but cait's mobility skill is E while Vaynes is Q. Let me change Cait's net to Q and then i have the same muscle memory for the mobility skill.

This is 2016 almost 2017. Why are we limited to the same keybinds for 100+ champs?

replies.body: I mean, you can easily rebind whatever you want at the start of a game.
That'll truly take far too long I feel

>
> That'll truly take far too long I feel

if your team wants to invade then you are struggling for time to change keybinds

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=AAkI6Vy8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-20T10:11:04.892+0000)
>
> I mean, you can easily rebind whatever you want at the start of a game.

then i have to do it every game.....

what i want is quick cast or auto cast or whatever it is, i want that to apply to individual champs instead of overall, i dont to forget that my Q as sion is on auto cast just as i need it, and with sion Q, why not have a hitbox indicator without auto cast on, and with auto cast on do what it does now, i know that would help me when i started to learn sion a long time ago

This is actually the most interesting thing I've seen about keybinds. This is actually quite interesting, like there's no other word to describe it.
I'd think it'd be insanely difficult to implement but I actually think it's possible. I'm thinking maybe start off with the 'fundamental' ones like QWERSDF. I can imagine it to be like a 'main' poke ability key, a 'main' mobility key, like a lot of champions have mobility on E like Lucian or as you said, Cait or Wukong or Shen. It'd be helpful definitely to have our own custom mappings for different champions. Depending on what's left in the future, but we could potentially stretch that out to different maps and perhaps even implemented like Item Sets (if they're every going to be a thing again).
